name: Accelerometer data recording is not impacted by setting movementDetectionEnabled to false
testSteps: Perform a recording with the movementDetectionEnabled set to false
expectedResult: The data in the `onMeasurementProcessed` event contains accelerometer data.
parentNames: Ability to change the properties in the Camera SDK
[Measurement sensors] gravEnabled - gyroEnabled - accEnabled - rotationEnabled - movementDetectionEnabled
